snippet: Iraq must create new structures that weave Middle Eastern countries closer together while accommodating the region’s ethnic and religious diversity.
abstract: Op-Ed article by former Iraqi minister of trade, defense and finance Ali A Allawi defines five critical challenges facing the country in the wake of the withdrawal of American troops; asserts that Iraq needs wise leadership and statesmanship.
lead_paragraph: Iraq must create new structures that weave Middle Eastern countries closer together while accommodating the region’s ethnic and religious diversity.

headline.seo: How Iraq Can Define Its Destiny
headline.main: How Iraq Can Define Its Destiny
headline.print_headline: How Iraq Can Define Its Destiny
